tool_description: Instantly find image links with keywords
name: Keyword to Image
title: Keyword to Image

api_list.name: GET Image URL
api_list.description: This GET request performs an image search on the most famous search engine using the keyword provided as a path parameter and returns an output string containing the URL of the found image.

optional_parameters.name: index
optional_parameters.description: Index of the search result to return (default is 0).
